# truenas_cloudsync_credentials (Data Source)

Fetches information about TrueNAS cloud sync credentials by name.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the cloud sync credentials to look up.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the credentials.
- `provider_type` (String) The type of cloud provider (s3, b2, gcs, azure).
